android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

splendid.logomaker.designer.permission.C.description: Allows the application to receive push notifications.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

com.huawei.android.launcher.permission.W.description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

com.oppo.launcher.permission.WRITE_SETTI.description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

manifest_analysis.title:
Clear text traffic is Enabled For App
[android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: The app intends to use cleartext network traffic, such as cleartext HTTP, FTP stacks, DownloadManager, and MediaPlayer. The default value for apps that target API level 27 or lower is "true". Apps that target API level 28 or higher default to "false". The key reason for avoiding cleartext traffic is the lack of confidentiality, authenticity, and protections against tampering; a network attacker can eavesdrop on transmitted data and also modify it without being detected.
manifest_analysis.name: Clear text traffic is Enabled For App [android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. playstore_details.title: Logo maker 2020 3D logo designer, Logo Creator app
playstore_details.description:
Create your Brand Logo now for free.
Free Logo maker and logo designer app for all type of business brands and online profiles. Professional logo maker helps you to create the best logo design you have imagined. Our ready made 5000+ original logo templates help you to get best logos for you in a minute. You have lots of options to show your creativity with huge collection of graphic designing elements such as typography, shapes, abstract logo images and symbols.


A professional logo designer may charge you huge amount for unique logo, for business logo design we pay but if you want to create unique logo for youtube channel or whatsapp group it is not possible to hire professional logo designer. Our graphic designing team designed 5000+ logos for you. Whatever the purpose is, still you can get the Unique, cool and impressive logo. 

Features of free logo maker app 2020:

1. 5000+ original logo templates and unlimited logo icons.
2. Add logo background colors, patterns, add your own background image and logo with transparent background.
3. 100+ Font styles, Add simple Text, typography, text effect / text art / name art maker,  slogan, emblem, shield logotype, symbol, icon, label and monogram maker.
4. Huge collection of graphic designing elements (shapes, icons, stickers, 3d logos, symbols, abstract images)
5. Add your own logo or images.
6. Advanced Editing tools for graphic designing such as image effects, filters, patterns, textures, 3D Rotate, Resize, Crop image by shapes and 3d effect manipulation.
7. Professional Business logo design, Watercolor logo designing, logo maker for youtube channel, whatsapp group, Instagram profile, Facebook group photo, esports logo maker free no watermark, gaming avatar maker and game clan logo designs.
8. Category wise logo designs and select by logo colors
9. Round logo maker and 3d logo maker. 
10. Save for future edit, download and Share the logo in social networks facebook, twitter, instagram, whatsapp.
11. Download logo in standard size 100*100, 250*250, 512*512, 800*800 and HD.

If you want to create professional logo for your business and it should be original and unique logo then it is the perfect app for you. All logos are designed by our graphic designing team. Even this app logo generated using this logo maker app. 

Ready Made 3d logo templates are available. If you want to design new 3d model use the 3d text creator. 

Free logo maker and logo creator has free and pro features. All premium tools are free and only premium original templates are paid (after implementation). 

Free logo creator are very easy to design logo for various purpose.
1. Professional Logo maker for business
2. Logo maker for YouTube channel, logo for Whatsapp group, instagram highlights, tik tok profile, logo for Facebook group, page profile picture and all social networks group logo.
3. Esports Logo maker for gamers with name and game avatar maker 
4. Website logo designer.
5. Logo designer for watermark on photo, 3d logo maker for video and PDF.

Logo designer for business using text, with letters and photos.
Logo templates are available for all business and organization such as boutique, coffee shops, restaurant food logo design, car service, pet shops, real estate, construction logo designs, DJ Music band, education institute, sports club, fitness gym logo, agriculture, beauty salon, clothes fashion designer, jewellery, photography watermark logo, tourism travel agency and online shop logo designs.

Create a great brand with the unique logo design. 
If any doubt in using this logo maker app you can email us splendidappmaker@gmail.com
